plugin.description: Plugin for some Utils like repeat selected task, etc.
plugin.author: @m1well

plugin.commands.name: repeater
plugin.commands.description: Repeat task(s) just by selecting them in whatever note you want with a lot of functionalities

plugin.commands.name: sorter
plugin.commands.description: Sort selected lines by type and by prio

plugin.commands.name: autoArchiveNotes
plugin.commands.description: Provides possibility to auto archive notes with a specific tag and a given lifetime (moves note to @Archive)

plugin.commands.name: cleanUpEmptyLinesInFuture
plugin.commands.description: Remove empty lines in future daily notes
